extendedInfo.description: BookChums: Indiaâs leading Books & eBooks community in your pocket. The BookChums Android App is the easiest way to access great books, read excellent reviews, get awesome recommendations, download free eBooks, share eBooks and know more about your favourite authors.BookChums latest version brings eBooks to your phone. With an integrated eBook reader that reads both PDF and ePub versions, now you can download eBooks and read them too in your favourite free books app on Android. Reading-on-the-go is now easy and with a collection of over 50,000 eBooks the fun is just beginning.You can access a growing collection of over 50,000 eBooks readily through your Android phone or tablet. Share, request and download eBooks with one of the fastest book-lovers community in the country. Earn Points, enter into exciting contests, win books & surprise gifts, author-signed exclusive copies, special invites, amazing discounts, loyalty points and more on BookChums App.Download this app and get 4 Bonus Points credited to your BookChums Profile right away. So what are you waiting for? Join Indiaâs fastest growing community of book-lovers just like you!BookChums App is also available on Facebook App Center for FB users.Follow us on: facebook.com/bookchums | twitter: @bookchums | pinterest.com/bookchums

reviews.title: Works great on Google nexus :-)
reviews.comment: The app works great on Google tab. Downloading ebooks is easy & swift. EBook share is the best option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst reader ever seen
reviews.comment: M not able to login.. N can not exit from its login page.. Its jst waste of time..
reviews.author: Sandeep Singh

reviews.title: not working :\'(
reviews.comment: it is not even working on my android phone... i love bookchums but i hate ths aap... please fix d problem... :\'(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Book chumps is a good app
reviews.comment: The app should be redesigned... As we can\'t search the free ebooks, we need to browse for many pages n then download what we like
reviews.author: Vivekananda MS

reviews.title: Niks
reviews.comment: Very bad app  When ever I try to search any book it just shows blank pages  Waste of time

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: When i tried to download a book it just showed blank page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app after update
reviews.comment: I recently updated to the latest version of the BookChums App. And it works! There were some issues with force closing on some Android versions in the previous version. But the new one is excellent with all bugs fixed. I love the simplicity and ease of use. Books on my phone makes it easy for me to carry my library around. A must have for those who love reading!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good attempt but need improvement
reviews.comment: I am irritated that evertime I try to download, it takes me to their website. There should be a direct download. And, when downloading a swapped book, I have to go to my email id, and then again the link will open my browser. I think the process should be redesigned.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shardul
reviews.comment: Breaks my heart but I need to uninstall .. Force closes after every 30 sec on my Xperia
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app for free ebooks
reviews.comment: Thanks bookchums, loved it. the free ebook and ebook swapping is the best features. I am using it on my iBall i6012 and it works great.  I have read couple of book reviews also...and it helped me in downloading the ebooks which I was not aware of. I am not sure if we can buy books using this... but PDF ebooks it\'s the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Siddharth...
reviews.comment: This was the very good app & any book i want that was available on this app...
reviews.author: Siddharth Upase

reviews.title: amazing collection of book
reviews.comment: really amazing site with all new updates of new ebooks.
